title: 45. You have a collection of audio/video files over 80GB each that you need to migrate to Google Cloud Storage. The files are in your on-premises data center. What migration method can you use to help speed up the transfer process?
alternatives: B. Use parallel uploads to break the file into smaller chunks then transfer it simultaneously.
C. Use the Cloud Transfer Service to transfer.
D. Use multithreaded uploads using the -m option.
